game.title: Garden Crop Duster
game.shortDescription: Sometimes, the best way to deliver fertilizer… is with a biplane!
game.longDescription:
### Controls

**L**, **R**: roll plane
**D**: pitch up
**U**: pitch down
**A**: drop ~~bom~~… er… fertilizer!

The controls *will* feel weird starting out; but you can master them! Good luck!
